message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent share.  Let's see if we can agree.
Let's be more equitable.  I'll take a larger share, but still give you a good portion. It's in both our best interests to reach an agreement.
Okay, I see you're willing to negotiate. Let's split it more evenly this time. We both need to compromise to get something before inflation eats away at the money.
